description:
This is a fairly technical area of single track that interweaves with part of the 
East Coast trail. It has some steep rocky sections that are not novice friendly, 
but easy to walk around.
See "White Hills" which is the same trail.
http://www.trailpeak.com/trail-White-Hills-NFLD-near-St-Johns-NF-2656
directions: It starts in Quidi Vidi and ends up behind the North Atlantic Ocean Science building. I only have the first half GPS'd so far, the second half is fairly obvious
title: Oceanside Single Track
